answers.answer: I'm like this all day. then I'm up all night peeing and don't get any sleep. its very frustrating
Me too. I know being constantly thirsty is a sign of diabetes so I'm curious for my glucose test Friday. But whatever. Water is good for you and the baby and it helps with swelling so drink up!

question: I'm sooooo thirsty!!!! & nothing satisfies it... I'm always thirsty, it's as of I'm craving a drink but idk what .
title: Thirst!
